post.title: Publishing options

author.name: Yashu Mittal
author.bio: I am the Founder and CEO at CodeCarrot and open source developer.

author.name: John O' Nolan
author.bio: I am the founder of Ghost foundation and we are doing a great job.

post.content:
Customise your social media sharing cards for Facebook and Twitter, enabling you to add custom images, titles and descriptions for social media.

Thereâ€™s no need to hard code your meta data. You can set your meta title and description using the post settings tool, which has a handy character guide and SERP preview.
